description:
Captain Kid and Killer look back on their adventures in the Land of Wano along with the other pirates from the Worst Generation, Luffy, Zoro, and Law. They describe how hard the five of them fought against the Emperors of the Sea, Kaido and Big Mom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Comprehensive Anatomy! Fierce Fight! The Five from the New Generation
Dai Tettei Kaibou! Gekitou! 5 Nin no Shin Sedai
Le grand exposé. Ça va saigner ! Les Cinq Nouveaux Venus
Umfassende Analyse! – Heftige Kämpfe! Die fünf der neuen Generation
大徹底解剖! 激闘! 5人の新世代
